version_description:
Important: This is the last version that supports iOS 13, be sure to update to the latest iOS version to receive future updates!

- Increased limit of free tier
- Tuned down the amount of times ads pop up
- Improved support options and underlying logs to be able provide better support
- Added option to export log to make it easier to send them with other email apps
- Added new products
- Improved UI
- Fixed some UI issues
- Fixed bug where app would ask permission to access local network
- Improved onboarding
- Added language to better explain certain functionality

- Fixed a bug that could cause an unexpected crash for some users (we hope)
- Minor bug fixes that are mainly invisible


Previous changes:

- Increased limit of free tier
- Tuned down the amount of times ads pop up
- Improved support options and underlying logs to be able provide better support
- Added option to export log to make it easier to send them with other email apps
- Added new products
- Improved UI
- Fixed some UI issues
- Fixed bug where app would ask permission to access local network
- Improved onboarding
- Added language to better explain certain functionality

- Fixed an issue that caused an information pop-up about the logs to not appear
- Fixed an issue with error handling during transactions
- Fixed wrong version number in settings
- Fixed an issue that would cause a false positive when checking for unauthorized alterations of the transaction process
- Minor stability improvements that are generally unnoticeable
